0002E21B.VoiceDir5.A5F52: A bit of heat and anger at those cowards who imprisoned you.

5D1088EA.Line1.A5F52: Oh, thank the gods! Most people don't bother to look up. I-I'm Nizaar.

660E6899.VoiceDir3.A5F52: Piling on the guilt and playing the pity card a bit. A genuine plea for help though, you're not faking it.

90F97BEE.Line5.A5F52: Those spineless thugs fled when you slew Ezmin, including the one with the key. They're probably camped nearby.

CC19EF17.VoiceDir1.A5F52: Huge relief. You expected to die in this gibbet, but now you have a chance to escape your fate.

F705026C.Line3.A5F52: (cough) D-do you think you might be able to get me down? I don't want to die up here.
